borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">By reason of the cumulative impact of the additions
to the dwellinghouse, in addition to their significant scale, bulk and massing,&nbsp;</span><font face="PT Sans, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">the proposed development will further
dominate the&nbsp;dwelling which will no longer reflect the character
of the original&nbsp;dwellinghouse and result in harm to the appearance of
the house, disrupting the </span>symmetry<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;and balance of the </span>semi<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">-detached pair, and impacting the </span>openness<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;of the corner plot, resulting in harm to the streetscene&nbsp;and character of the area, especially noting the siting within the Becontree Estate. Additionally, the proposed development will significantly reduce the useable amenity space at the dwelling, reducing the quality of </span>accommodation<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;at the site.</span></font></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;National
Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policy CP2 and CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development
Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local
Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March
2011)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations
Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p>















</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;The London
Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission
Version, December 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
description: Construction of a double storey rear and side extension.
